sub_title: Assemblage medewerker bij Futura Composites B.V. te Heerhugowaard
summary: After 28 years of dancing in showteams (from 1983), choreographing for others (from 1985), co-owning several salsa dance companies (from 1997) and giving salsa dance entertainment workhops, classes & bootcamps for others (from 1998), I decided to start my very own dance company in November 2011: Wooden Clogs Dance Productions. I offer salsa and other Afro Latin dance related services to private parties as well as (dance) schools and to other companies.

treasury_media.description: On October 30th, 2017, Sederick Blommestijn-Short celebrated 20 years of teaching, choreographing and entertaining in Afro Latin dance styles such as salsa, ...

education.field_of_study: Salsa dance techniques and didactical skills
Dutch, English, Biology, Chemistry, History, Computing.

awards.title: DDS Dutch Champion Master Salsa on1
awards.description: Winner (together with Roos Dormaar) of the official Dutch salsa dance competition in the 'Master Salsa on1' category held on May 5th, 2017 in Club Mariz, Castricum (The Netherlands).

projects.title: Youth Revolution Dance Company
projects.description:
Jackelyn Meriën’s amateur showteam ‘Youth Revolution’  was the first ‘street style dance team’ I was a team member of on the island of Curaçao, Dutch Caribbean. I learned :

• Antillean folk dances: the Antillean Waltz, the Tumba, the Tambú, the Baile di Sínta and the Mazurka,
• Merengue Show dancing . Shows: Merengue on Kassav’s ‘Zouk La Sé Sel Medikaman Nou Ni’ (choreographer: Luis Felipie) and Wilfrido Vargas’ ‘El Jardinero’ (choreographers: Luis Felipie & Allen Tromp). Many performances at parties and events across the island and on the children’s TV programme ‘Tele Fiesta’ (Tele Curaçao),
• To become a dance teacher: I started on request to teach the dance steps to other team members,
• Literally ‘on the streets’: Electric Boogie dance, Breakdance, Hip Hop and ‘Videoclip dancing (which later became Streetdance),
• A couple of Ballet and Tango dance classes at the École de Danse Les Selphides. I performed in a ‘World Dance’ show at Curacao’s theatre ‘Centro Pro Arte,
• A Jazz Ballet choreography of the famous Fina and performed together with Luis Felipie, Allen Tromp and Wendel Foendoe among others.

contributors.headline: Assemblage medewerker bij Futura Composites B.V. te Heerhugowaard

projects.title: Interactive History of Afro Latin Dance Bootcamp
projects.description: This is a bootcamp in which we travel together through the dance history of Afro Latin Dance. It is a lecture in which I use PowerPoint, video and the Internet in my presentation. And we will also do different dances which are both directly - and indirectly - related to the development of Afro Latin dancing.

profile_positions.title: Assemblage medewerker

profile_positions.description:
At Cross Your Borders I teach merengue and salsa dancing to high school students of 3 HAVO/VWO that are learning about injustice and poverty in the Third World countries. The schools are spread across the Netherlands. I mix:
* History: The slave trade & labour, the Cuban Revolution and the migration of the latin population to the United States,
* Geography: West Africa, Curaçao, the Dominican Republic, Cuba and the United States,
* Sociology: modern day slavery, the development of mankind, prejudice, war, the unequal distribution of wealth, war and nationalism,
* Music & Rhythm: The '4/4 beat of most Western music, the 'Quick Quick slow'​ of salsa and the origins of the Son, (Afro Cuban) Rumba and the (Dirty Dancing) Mambo,
* Using the imagination and 'out of the box'​ thinking as tools for achieving great goals. 

This all happens in 1 hour.

Content:
* Warming up with Soca music,
* Merengue: Basic, 'Merengue Line'​ with hip movement and floorcraft,
* Merengue partnering,
* Salsa Battle: the Leaders against the Followers. 3 basic salsa steps: 'Son'​, 'Rumba'​ & 'Mambo'.
* Salsa Partnering on Salsatón music. the 3 basic steps combined with turn patterns of the merengue.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Merengue & Salsa Dance Instructor and Entertainer

profile_positions.description: Under my company - Wooden Clogs Dance Productions - I'm mostly a 'gun for hire': Club Fiera Social Club hires me to teach regular LA style salsa on1 dance classes from beginners to impovers dance levels. Others also hire me to teach (entertaining & professional) merengue, several salsa dance styles, and bachata moderna workshops & bootcamps for beginners to advanced dance level students. Dance schools hire me to choreograph dance routines for their students, I give private dance classes and also choreograph wedding dances.
profile_positions.title: Independent Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
This is the website belonging to Wooden Clogs Dance Productions. 
* Render service as a freelance merengue, different styles of salsa & bachata moderna dance instructor,
* Choreograph merengue, salsa & bachata dance routines, 
* Give (entertaining) dance workshops to private parties, corporations & (salsa) schools,
* Hold interactive lectures on the history of salsa dancing, 
* Give private dance classes and choreograph wedding dances.
profile_positions.title: Afro Latin Dance Instructor, Entertainer & Choreographer

profile_positions.description:
* Introduced the concept of salsa dance syllabï. Helped develop the dance school's own salsa syllabus in 4 levels of LA style salsa (on1) dancing and train it's team (August/September 2007).
* Teaching courses in several dance levels of LA style salsa (on1).
* Give entertaining salsa dance workhops to private parties and other businesses.  
* Doing promotional activities during the dance classes and on social media. 
* Also: doing promotional workshops, doing the attendance administration and and mentoring (new) dance assistants.
* Choreograph and train dance routines to students.
profile_positions.title: Freelance salsa dance instructor, choreographer and entertainer

profile_positions.description:
Ambiente Den Helder is one off the oldest salsa schools in the Netherlands. 

* Freelance LA style salsa (on1), Cuban Rueda de Casino and Bachata Moderna dance teacher giving dance courses from beginners to advanced dance levels. 
* Choreographed several dance routines for it's students, including the 'MJ meets Salsa Demo'. 
* From 2014: given several Bachata Moderna bootcamps for Ambiente. 

Owners: Willem Dekker & Epifania.
profile_positions.title: Freelance merengue, salsa & bachata dance teacher & choreographer

profile_positions.description: www.supersalsa.nl is a product of Wooden Clogs Dance Productions and the website of the Dutch Dance Sport Salsa Champions 'Master on1'. We offer several Afro Latin dance related services, including salsa dance workshops & performances for corporations and businesses. http://www.supersalsa.nl/workshops-voor-bedrijven/
profile_positions.title: Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
As the content manager of the international salsa entertainment and news website OnlineSalsa.com, I was tasked with: 
* Creating, coördinating and editing it's content on a daily basis: 
- Writing salsa news and lifestyle articles (blog format),
- Rewrite news on international Latin dance & music,
- Coördinate, edit and post news from other content writers,
- Interview salsa dancers for the 'SalsaDancer of the Week'​ segment,
- Review salsa and other latin music CD's,
- Writing articles which promote upcoming international salsa, and other afro latin festivals and congresses, 
- Searching and posting high quality salsa dance and instructional videos online into the 'Salsa Index'​,
- Interview afro latin dance stars at festival & parties.

*Adding content to the website:
- Search for good pictures/video's online and imbed them in the articles,
- Making the articles SEO friendly,
- Posting 3 articles on a daily basis on the website.

* Posting the end results on several social media accounts. 
- On several Facebook and twitter accounts, several times a day,
- Also: video clips of latin music, dance shows and great social dance

The website once ranked in the top 20 most popular salsa sites worldwide. With thousands of salsa fans hitting OnlineSalsa.com everyday, for salsa dance news, entertainment, music, videos and events, the site became a source to count with. 

CEO and founder of OnlineSalsa.com: Susanne Waldau – te Brake.
profile_positions.title: Web Content Manager, Blogger

profile_positions.description:
Together with Evie Boerhout. 

* Teaching salsa dance courses, 
* Freelance salsa dance teacher for other dance schools: Ambiente Den Helder, Salsa Learning Classes, Salsacompleta,
* Salsa dance choreographer and performer. Shows: 'Classical Salsa'​ (students), Show X (students), 'A Gozar'​, 'Salsa Guerilla'​ and 'Un Merengue Divertido'​  
* Give entertaining merengue and salsa dance workshops, mainly for salsa dance school Salsa4Fun,
* Teaching regular salsa dance classes, give dance workshops, help with developing the salsa syllabus of - and perform shows for - Club Fiera Social Dance, and choreograph/train it's student salsa show team 'Çlub Fiera Ijmond'​,
* Giving entertaining & educational merengue and salsa dance worshops to high school students for Cross Your Borders,
* Giving entertaining streetdance workshops at several elementary schools,
* Choreograph salsa dance routines and train our own students show team 'Salsapunt Dance Company'​, which had my little brother Anderson as a member,
* Organizing parties for children with dance entertainment (MJ Dance workshop, K3 dance and others) in collaboration with the childrens activity center 'Amberossia'.
profile_positions.title: Co Owner

volunteer_experiences.description: Key Club is the youth chapter of the Kiwanis Club on the Island of Curacao, Dutch Antilles. Based at the high school of María Immaculata Lyceum, the members of Key Club used to organize fundraising activities for the youth such as playback shows, parties and fairs. The money was then used to organize fun activities for mainly the poor elderly and the mentally & fysically disabled youth.
